entry.message: [info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmpji2pn7m1\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0154.10069] The filer has reported a value for global intangible low-taxed income that is not using the element defined in the US-GAAP taxonomy. The FASB has added elements for the GILTI percentage amount and the GILTI monetary amount in the 2022 taxonomy. These elements are:
1. EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationGiltiPercent 2. EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationGiltiAmount
The element bfam:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationGILTIBenefitAmount with the label "GILTI amount" has been used in the filing in the disclosure section "0000079 - Disclosure - INCOME TAXES - Additional Information (Details)" that should be updated to the appropriate US-GAAP element listed above.
Rule Element Id:10069 Rule version: 21.0.2CR -
